_header: It was a squire of low degree
Note:
For a shorter version in 170 lines see London, British Library Addit. 27879, ff. 444-6, ed. Hales and Furnivall (1867)
XJohn Wesley Hales, and Frederick James Furnivall. Bishop Percy’s Folio Manuscript: Ballads and Romances. 3 vols. London: Trübner, 1867-68, 3. 263.
